TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {225621=SAIL is in the Steel - Large sector. The current market capitalisation stands at Rs 24,080.96 crore. The company management includes Rakesh Singh - Chairman & Managing Director, Anil Kumar Chaudhary - Director - Finance, S S Mohanty - Director - Technical, Kalyan Maity - Director, Binod Kumar - Director - Commercial, Upendra Prasad Singh - Government Director, Atmanand - Independent Director, J M Mauskar - Independent Director, Sunil Barthwal - Nominee Director, Bharathi S Sihag - Government Director, T S Suresh - Director - Projects, Kalyan Maity - Director, Vinod Kumar Thakral - Director, Upendra Prasad Singh - Government Director. It is listed on the BSE with a BSE Code of 500113 and the NSE with an NSE Code of SAIL. Its Registered office is at Ispat Bhawan, Lodi Road, New Delhi,Delhi - 110003. Their Registrars are M C S Ltd., 135582=JSWSteel Jul Fut, 224321=Astec LifeSciences Recommended on Mar 31st 2015, 134875=UnitedBrewerie Jul Fut, 134364=28 July 2015}
